author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA REORGANIZING AND EXPECTED TO BEGIN INTENSIFYING SOON... ...HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING EXPECTED FOR PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...MELISSA REORGANIZING AND EXPECTED TO BEGIN INTENSIFYING SOON... ...HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING EXPECTED FOR PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 11:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 23 the center of Melissa was located near 15.4, -74.9 with movement NNW at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA REORGANIZING AND EXPECTED TO BEGIN INTENSIFYING SOON... ...HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING EXPECTED FOR PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA THROUGH THE WEEKEND... As of 11:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 23 the center of Melissa was located near 15.4, -74.9 with movement NNW at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
